[category] WHERE [category].[is_visible] = 1 UNION SELECT [categories_recursive].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] || \'>\' || [categories_recursive].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id] FROM [categories_recursive] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[id] = [categories_recursive].[parent_id] ), [categories]([id], [name]) AS ( SELECT [categories_recursive].[id] AS [id], [categories_recursive].[name] AS [name] FROM [categories_recursive] WHERE [categories_recursive].[parent_id] IS NULL ) SELECT [actions_sort].*, [transaction_account].[name] AS [transaction_account_name], [transaction_account].[currency_id] AS [transaction_account_currency_id], [transfer_account_from].[name] AS [transfer_account_from_name], [transfer_account_from].[currency_id] AS [transfer_account_from_currency_id], [transfer_account_to].[name] AS [transfer_account_to_name], [transfer_account_to].[currency_id] AS [transfer_account_to_currency_id], [transaction_account_currency].[symbol] AS [transaction_account_currency_symbol], [transfer_account_from_currency].[symbol] AS [transfer_account_from_currency_symbol], [transfer_account_to_currency].[symbol] AS [transfer_account_to_currency_symbol], [transaction_category].[name] AS [transaction_category_name] FROM ( SELECT [actions_raw].* FROM ( SELECT 1 AS [is_transaction], [transaction].[id] AS [id], [transaction].[category_id] AS [transaction_category_id], [transaction].[account_id] AS [transaction_account_id], [transaction].[sum10000] AS [transaction_sum10000], [transaction].[product] AS [transaction_product], NULL AS [transfer_account_id_from], NULL AS [transfer_account_id_to], NULL AS [transfer_sum10000_from], NULL AS [transfer_sum10000_to], [transaction].[created_at_utc] AS [created_at_utc] FROM [transaction] WHERE [transaction].[is_committed] = 0 UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS [is_transaction], [transfer].[id] AS [id], NULL AS [transaction_category_id], NULL AS [transaction_account_id], NULL AS [transaction_sum10000], NULL AS [transaction_product], [transfer].[account_id_from] AS [transfer_account_id_from], [transfer].[account_id_to] AS [transfer_account_id_to], [transfer].[sum10000_from] AS [transfer_sum10000_from], [transfer].[sum10000_to] AS [transfer_sum10000_to], [transfer].[created_at_utc] AS [created_at_utc] FROM [transfer] WHERE [transfer].[is_committed] = 0 ) AS [actions_raw] ORDER BY [actions_raw].[created_at_utc] DESC ) AS [actions_sort] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transaction_account] ON [transaction_account].[id] = [actions_sort].[transaction_account_id] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transfer_account_from] ON [transfer_account_from].[id] = [actions_sort].[transfer_account_id_from] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transfer_account_to] ON [transfer_account_to].[id] = [actions_sort].[transfer_account_id_to] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transaction_account_currency] ON [transaction_account_currency].[id] = [transaction_account].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transfer_account_from_currency] ON [transfer_account_from_currency].[id] = [transfer_account_from].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transfer_account_to_currency] ON [transfer_account_to_currency].[id] = [transfer_account_to].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [categories] AS [transaction_category] ON [transaction_category].[id] = [actions_sort].[transaction_category_id]

WITH RECURSIVE [categories_recursive]([id], [name], [parent_id]) AS ( SELECT [category].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id] FROM [category] WHERE [category].[is_visible] = 1 UNION SELECT [categories_recursive].[id] AS [id], [category].[name] || \'>\' || [categories_recursive].[name] AS [name], [category].[parent_id] AS [parent_id] FROM [categories_recursive] INNER JOIN [category] ON [category].[id] = [categories_recursive].[parent_id] ), [categories]([id], [name]) AS ( SELECT [categories_recursive].[id] AS [id], [categories_recursive].[name] AS [name] FROM [categories_recursive] WHERE [categories_recursive].[parent_id] IS NULL ) SELECT [actions_sort].*, [transaction_account].[name] AS [transaction_account_name], [transaction_account].[currency_id] AS [transaction_account_currency_id], [transfer_account_from].[name] AS [transfer_account_from_name], [transfer_account_from].[currency_id] AS [transfer_account_from_currency_id], [transfer_account_to].[name] AS [transfer_account_to_name], [transfer_account_to].[currency_id] AS [transfer_account_to_currency_id], [transaction_account_currency].[symbol] AS [transaction_account_currency_symbol], [transfer_account_from_currency].[symbol] AS [transfer_account_from_currency_symbol], [transfer_account_to_currency].[symbol] AS [transfer_account_to_currency_symbol], [transaction_category].[name] AS [transaction_category_name] FROM ( SELECT [actions_raw].* FROM ( SELECT 1 AS [is_transaction], [transaction].[id] AS [id], [transaction].[category_id] AS [transaction_category_id], [transaction].[account_id] AS [transaction_account_id], [transaction].[sum10000] AS [transaction_sum10000], [transaction].[product] AS [transaction_product], NULL AS [transfer_account_id_from], NULL AS [transfer_account_id_to], NULL AS [transfer_sum10000_from], NULL AS [transfer_sum10000_to], [transaction].[created_at_utc] AS [created_at_utc] FROM [transaction] WHERE [transaction].[is_committed] = 1 AND [transaction].[created_at_utc] >= ?1 AND [transaction].[created_at_utc] <= ?2 UNION ALL SELECT 0 AS [is_transaction], [transfer].[id] AS [id], NULL AS [transaction_category_id], NULL AS [transaction_account_id], NULL AS [transaction_sum10000], NULL AS [transaction_product], [transfer].[account_id_from] AS [transfer_account_id_from], [transfer].[account_id_to] AS [transfer_account_id_to], [transfer].[sum10000_from] AS [transfer_sum10000_from], [transfer].[sum10000_to] AS [transfer_sum10000_to], [transfer].[created_at_utc] AS [created_at_utc] FROM [transfer] WHERE [transfer].[is_committed] = 1 AND [transfer].[created_at_utc] >= ?1 AND [transfer].[created_at_utc] <= ?2 ) AS [actions_raw] ORDER BY [actions_raw].[created_at_utc] DESC ) AS [actions_sort] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transaction_account] ON [transaction_account].[id] = [actions_sort].[transaction_account_id] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transfer_account_from] ON [transfer_account_from].[id] = [actions_sort].[transfer_account_id_from] LEFT JOIN [account] AS [transfer_account_to] ON [transfer_account_to].[id] = [actions_sort].[transfer_account_id_to] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transaction_account_currency] ON [transaction_account_currency].[id] = [transaction_account].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transfer_account_from_currency] ON [transfer_account_from_currency].[id] = [transfer_account_from].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [currency] AS [transfer_account_to_currency] ON [transfer_account_to_currency].[id] = [transfer_account_to].[currency_id] LEFT JOIN [categories] AS [transaction_category] ON [transaction_category].[id] = [actions_sort].[transaction_category_id]
